text: Neil Marks (born 13 September 1938) is an Australian cricketer. He played ten first-class matches for New South Wales between 1958/59 and 1959/60. In the 2019 Australia Day Honours Marks was awarded the Medal of the Order of Australia (OAM) for service to cricket. ==See also== * List of New South Wales representative cricketers ==References== ==External links== * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Australian cricketers Category:New South Wales cricketers Category:Cricketers from Sydney Category:Recipients of the Medal of the Order of Australia
title: Neil Marks
